definitions.definition: A measured portion of medicine taken at any one time.
examples: Why did he give you only a single 500 mg dose ? The correct dosage of this antibiotic is one 500 mg tablet twice a day for 10 days.

definitions.definition: The quantity of an agent (not always active), substance, or radiation administered or experienced at any one time.
( figurative , dated ) Anything disagreeable that must be taken.
( figurative ) A good measure or lengthy experience of something.
( Ireland , colloquial ) A cold ; a common, viral illness of the nasal passage , sometimes with fever .
